exceptions.exn: The reference HenumX was not found in the current environment.
The reference HenumY was not found in the current environment.

original: intros HX HY HenumX HenumY. destruct HenumX as [fX HX']. destruct HenumY as [fY HY']. exists (fun n => match (fX n) with | Some x => Some (inl x) | None => match (fY n) with | Some y => Some (inr y) | None => None end end). intros [x | y]. - destruct (HX' x) as [n Hn]. exists n. rewrite Hn. now destruct (fX n). - destruct (HY' y) as [n Hn]. exists n. rewrite Hn. now destruct (fY n).
